name: Reconnecting Communities Pilot (RCP) Discretionary Grant Program
objective: The Reconnecting Communities Pilot Program provides technical assistance and Federal financial assistance for planning grants and capital construction grants to address infrastructure barriers, reconnect communities, and improve peoples’ lives.
sub_agency_name: Office of the Secretary of Tranportation (OST) Procurement Operations

results.description: On March 13th, 2023, U.S. Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg announced $185 million in grant awards for Reconnecting Communities Pilot (RCP) Program awards.  The program was coupled with a one-time funding infusion from the Neighborhood Equity and Access (NAE) program, which brought the total amount awarded to $3.3 billion.
